channel.title: Career on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Career on C'est la Z

item.title: You Can't Win If You Don't Enter
item.description: Or, as Wayne Gretzky said "You miss 100% of the shots you don't take." Why do I mention this? Because I've been hearing way too often from young people who are too quick to deny themselves opportunities and too often these are from students who have come from less advantaged backgrounds. It's Fall and I've been making my rounds visiting local schools to talk to seniors about colleges in general and Hunter CS in particular.
